name: Stunts Flying FireTruck 3D
description:
Stunts Flying FireTruck 3D is a addictive simulators on trucking industry. This game is for all ages who like to do advantures. infect your kids also love this game.
This game not include massive jumps, mid-air hoops, floating platforms, spiral roadways and outlandish maneuvers in impossible environments.
Features
- Large city map with multiple buildings
- Test your truck driving skills
- Improve airplane flight ability
- Easy and Free to use
